resources.string: Something went wrong, please try logging in again.
This app can only be used when account and calendar permissions are given.
In order to sync your Facebook events with your local calendar, we need permission to access your accounts and contacts. You can enable these permissions in your app info.
In order to sync your Facebook events with your local calendar, we need permission to access your calendar. You can enable these permissions in your app info.
In order to sync your Facebook events with your local calendar, we need permission to access your calendar and your accounts. You can enable these permissions in your app info.
You\'ve successfully signed in with Facebook. Click the button below to sync your Facebook eventsResponse with your local calendar now.
